price: ពួកគេនឹងមិនជឿចំពោះវាឡើយ លុះត្រាតែពួកគេឃើញ នូវទារុណកម្មយ៉ាងឈឺចាប់។
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
